data.title: An Evening of Improv with Colin Mochrie & Debra McGrath (Kamloops)
data.meta_description: Famed dynamic duo of improv, Colin Mochrie and Debra McGrath are bringing their customized, quick-witted, and uproariously entertaining show to the Sagebrush Theatre in Kamloops! This show is guaranteed to have you in stitches, and will prove why—when it comes to improv—it’s “best to say yes".
data.text:
Sagebrush Theatre

September 7, 2024 | 7:30-9:00 pm

Click here for tickets!

Experience an evening of comedy brilliance as the acclaimed improv duo, Colin Mochrie (Whose Line is it anyway?) and Deb McGrath (Little Mosque on the Prairie), take the stage at the Sagebrush Theatre! This is an all ages show that you don't want to miss.

With their quick wit, unmatched chemistry, and hilarious improv skills, Colin and Debra are guaranteed to leave you roaring with laughter whether it be as a spectator, or possibly as a participant onstage! This show will have you in stitches from start to finish, and will prove why—when it comes to improv—it’s “best to say yes”.

Colin Mochrie, the celebrated Canadian comedian and improv actor, has captured the hearts of audiences far and wide with his unparalleled wit and comedic genius. Best known for his role as a regular cast member on the improv comedy show Whose Line Is It Anyway? and is widely considered to be one of the leading improvisers in the world. In 2013, Colin Mochrie was named Canadian Comedy Person of the Year at the Canadian Comedy Awards. Colin also spent two seasons as a cast member on popular CBC satirical television series This Hour Has 22 Minutes and has been involved in numerous other television shows, both in North America and beyond, including Supertown Challenge and CBC’s Blackfly.

Debra McGrath started her career as a member of the Toronto Second City, she has become a familiar name in Canadian film and television due to her numerous appearances in various TV shows and movies, such as Little Mosque on the Prairie, Murdoch Mysteries, Baroness Von Sketch Show, Expecting, Junior’s Giant, and Getting Along Famously, to name a few. McGrath is also the creator of the Women Fully Clothed comedy troupe.

Colin and Debra have been performing for decades and although they once played a con­stantly feud­ing show­biz cou­ple, they’ve been happily married for years.

-----------------------
